meanings.sent1: Her indagation into the mysterious noise led her to discover a hidden door.
meanings.sent2: The detective's indagation revealed the truth behind the crime.
meanings.sent3: During her indagation, she accidentally stumbled upon a secret treasure map.
meanings.sent4: His indagation of the ancient ruins unearthed long-forgotten secrets.
meanings.sent5: The indagation of the missing keys finally solved the mystery.
